Reviews.Author: Harry
Reviews.Content: Had the sweet potato fries and they were great. Burger was average. On the dry side probably because our only options were medium and well done. Got the southwestern with jalapeño bacon, but it didn't have bacon. Too hungry to send it back. I like a burger that's juicy and messy and this was none of that. And it was not just me but the most of our party of 9.    You want a juicy burger this is not the place.

Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: Gluten free burger was soooo good!  Our waitress was super friendly and I got to choose off of a gluten free menu!  So my boyfriend (not gf) and I went for dinner and honestly weren't expecting anything amazing, well we were surprised.  I got the gf option and of course the part that pleasantly surprised me was the gf bun. I haven't had a good gf bun before but decided to try. It was so good!  My bf said it was one of the best burgers he has ever had.  Overall we would definitely tell anyone on the fence to go to this place.  We're in vegas a few more nights and we will for sure be back!

Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: Tasty food and probably some of the best drinks for the price we had in Vegas!  Our waiter was great with the recommendations both at the restaurant and beyond (wish I could remember his name), but he was brutally honest about all things Vegas and pretty entertaining.    One of the great things about this place was all the different options for sauces, which they gladly bring out bottles of as many as you want so you can try them all on the side!

Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: My husband and I are here for our last dinner in Vegas. I really wasn't in the mood for anything in particular... He was ready to eat his own arm. As we walked through New York New York, we saw  Broadway Burger Bar  and decided to look no further.  I found the menu (somewhat) limited. My husband went with the Cowboy Burger which had bacon, (pepper jack) cheese, onions and BBQ sauce on it. He is lactose intolerant and can't do pepper jack cheese so he asked if he could get provolone instead and the server said there was an up charge for provolone... I personally have NEVER heard of an up charge for a cheese switch, especially provolone???? He then asked for it to be cooked Medium Well and she said they ONLY cook the burgers medium or well... Personally have NEVER heard of only 2 temps either. Weird. Sides do not come with the burgers so you pay extra if you want fries. They do have a combo where you get a burger and add fries and a drink for $5 more (which is what he did). He said the burger was really good but unfortunately having it well done made it dry (but he was nervous getting it med). The fries were great too, fresh cut.  I ended up choosing just a house salad. I asked if I could get romaine lettuce instead of the lettuce it was supposed to come with. There was a looooooooooong pause... And I continued,  Or is that a problem??  Eventually she said I could have romaine. (Almost then asked if there would be an up charge for that switch). The description said the salad came with a  sherry vinaigrette  but I get weird with dressings, they can make or break a salad so I asked for it on the side. It ended up being good BUT I wouldn't call it a vinaigrette... It was a creamy dressing similar in consistency to Caesar or ranch. I see vinaigrette and I think more or a thin Italian-like, oil & vinegar dressing.   Iced tea cost $4. Yikes. Seemed high.  Server was ok. She wasn't super friendly but did her job.   All in all, food was good and came out fast. They'll charge you for everything extra. I'd say we'd be back but I like to try new restaurants.

Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This is my experience here with my family.  We were walking by and looking at the menu to find no kids items but wait the host handed us a kids menu with out even asking us what we were looking for they had mac and cheese just what my boys wanted so we went in. Our waiter was awesome he took our boys order while me and my wife were looking at the menu. After a few minutes we asked for help deciding as everything looked so good. He told us 2 good burgers then he told us if we split a combo it would save us money so we did and let me tell you the burgers were top notch the chef  is awesome.  Service was awesome just all around will come back and tell all my friends.

Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: Pros: Service was decent, garlic fries were AWESOME. Big enough for 2 to share. Cons: Meal was just okay. Had the chicken and brie burger. My friend had a salmon burger and didn't really like it.  Prices are just okay as well, they range from like $10-15 for a burger with fries. We wanted something quick as we had already tried the Cafe at Monte Carlo and walked out (no service after 10-15 mins) so this fulfilled that.

Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: We stay at the NYNY casino frequently and this is one of our favorite places for Lunch/Dinner. This past week we stayed at Mandalay Bay but were in NYNY and dropped in for a meal before venturing out into the casino. The hostess and waiter was very friendly (as they all are), sat us immediately and got our drinks quickly.   The food is always very good, many selections of gourmet burgers and always perfectly prepared and great tasting!!!    Recommended if you are in the area.

Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: The southwest burger is awesome with its jalapeño bacon, wow!!! My gf ordered the chicken bltg.  The chicken breast was huge, juicy, and flavorful, just how I like'em. We also shared a side if onion rings.  They were crispy and not dripping oil. And they were very generous with their bacon servings

Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Honestly one of the worst burgers I have ever eaten. I ordered a medium cooked cowboy burger and it was more like well done and very dry. My wife ordered a well done bacon cheese burger and I am not sure how she got through half of the burger. The service was good and the pineapple upside cake drink my wife had was outstanding which is why it got 2 stars instead of 1.   Update: Since my bad experience at Broadway Burger, I was been contacted by their staff and after some great discussions they gave me a full refund for my meal. They definitely have an A+ when it comes to customer service. I will definitely give Broadway Burgers after chance next time I am in Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Darrell
Reviews.Content: Every casino, seems now days, has a top end burger joint.  This one is NY NY's place.  It ain't high end.  More reminiscence for a walk out counter, but you can sit down and order off the menu.  Much better than any fast food joint.  Much better.  But not as good as the other casino burger joints.

Reviews.Author: Risomar
Reviews.Content: Excelente ambiente! Comida maravilhosa! Estávamos com muita fome por isto pedi agilidade o que fui prontamente atendido!

Reviews.Author: Simone
Reviews.Content: Tasty burgers.  We ordered the Italian and the Philly burger medium.  The patties were cooked just as ordered and the overall taste was good.  We also had the garlic and chili cheese fries with a Caesar salad.  I liked the garlic fries more than the chili cheese.  We wanted to keep our stomachs ready for the buffet, so we ordered 2 burgers to share among the 4 of us.  And to be honest, it was more than enough to get us all full.  It came out to be a $50+ lunch for the food and drinks, but hey, that's Vegas for you.

Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: We had been to this restaurant 3 years ago (the last time in Vegas)  & my partner said it was a must to return again. He loved his last burger so much.  This time around we had the Bacon & Cheeseburger and the Asian style salmon burger. My partner said he enjoyed his Burger, but I noticed he didn't rave on about it like last time. I quite enjoyed the salmon burger. It was nice to see and try something other than beef burgers on a menu. They also had chicken, turkey & vegetarian mushroom burgers available.  We were quick to be seated. It didn't appear to be an overly busy night but about half full.  My only complaint would be that we felt rushed by the waitress. We hadn't even finished our meals & she was trying to take our plates away & plonked the cheque down. I noticed she did it to another customer who was eating alone. Too bad if you wanted to order anything else. She must have been at the end of her shift & in a rush to settle her tips & get out.

Reviews.Author: Calvin
Reviews.Content: The burger just wasn't very good. The bun was dry. The patty has no flavor. The waitress was terrible. We waited 30 minutes and asked the waitress if the burgers are close to being ready because the show is about to start. She said the burgers have to cook and walked away. Not to mention she never brought my friend his water. Just terrible.

Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: The burgers are great, but the fries were soggy and undercooked. Our table got the Italian burger, the southwestern burger, the build your own burger, and the chicken sandwich. I'd highly recommend them all! They also have a good selection of condiments.

Reviews.Author: Valerie
Reviews.Content: One of the best burgers that I have ever had and I'm not even too crazy about burgers! They use all natural grass fed cattle for the meat. The meat is so tender and juicy! The staff was extremely friendly and attentive. I will be coming back here during my next visit!

Reviews.Author: Norma
Reviews.Content: The burger here was delicious! You get a huge beef patty, the buns are super soft, and I ordered extra pickles! I'm not sure why it has such low stars but I found this place to be pretty good and super close to my hotel.....plus it wasn't Mcdonalds and it didn't make my tummy ache! Perfect meal to aid in any hangover while your in Vegas. And very affordable too!

Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: By far one of the best burgers I've ever had.  I love the fact they are healthy and non-greasy but so tasty!  We had the Southwestern and Philly Cheese Steak.  Definitely going back on our next trip to LV.

Reviews.Author: Taylor
Reviews.Content: Grass fed beef for a super great deal.  Great chicken as well. Absolutely wonderful food. This was my first time at New York New York and this place is definitely the go-to here. Fast and friendly service. Pretty loud, but that's expected from a casino with a roller coaster. I recommend to everyone who likes meat!

Reviews.Author: Myra
Reviews.Content: Burgers are great. Got the salmon burger with white cheddar and crispy onions. They don't put sauces though unless you specifically ask which I didn't know I was supposed to do. Tasted better when I got ranch on the side... Garlic fries are EXCELLENT!

Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Stumbled into the New York New York Casino around 3 a.m. and this was the only restaurant open.  (It's not usually open that late, but the other restaurant was temporarily closed.)  I ordered the Cowboy burger - applewood smoked bacon, barbecue sauce, crisp onions and Pepper Jack cheese.  It hit the spot as a late night option.  The cheese was only barely melted, which was a disappointment.  The fries were relatively bland, but there were enough to share.  I'm not sure if the preparation is better during the daytime, but this is a fairly decent food option if you're in the area.

Reviews.Author: Anne
Reviews.Content: Yum! This was our first meal in Vegas while we were waiting for our room to be ready at the MGM Signature. I had the greek burger which I am still thinking about a month later! Service was fast and friendly. The place is great for people watching, especially by the humanity theater. We came back for dessert another time after seeing Zumanity, the brownie sundae was also wonderful! We will come back next time we are in Vegas. I give it five stars, because I really don't have a single complaint!

Reviews.Author: Zack
Reviews.Content: Other than the prices (my first meal in Vegas so still getting used to the costs) and the bbq sauce I dripped on my shirt this was a perfect lunch. The burger was juicy and had a great taste.   No refills on the $3+ lemonade was a little ridiculous.

Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I went here in late March while playing the ponies in the NYNY Casino sports book. I walked up to the bar area, took a seat and was approached fairly quickly by a bartender that offered me a drink. It was about 11:00am, so alcohol wasn't in the question.   I cannot recall the name of the burger that I had, but it was your run of the mill hamburger with the fried egg in it. I opted out of the cheese and had some sweet potato fries on the side.   The reason it gets 4 stars is because of the taste, location, value, and service. Unfortunately, the  touristy-ness  takes away a star, and that's not the restaurant's fault. I understand it's part of a big tourist area and how they try really hard to appeal for tourist dollars. The price is very good given the type of food you are ordering and the location of the restaurant.  Finally, the service was good. I remember that the bartender was very friendly, and knew that most of the patrons coming in and out of their restaurant were people who were playing the sports book and/or ponies, like myself.  In essence, this place offers a good quality  high end  burger. I am a fan. See attached picture of my meal.

Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: We hope you go there when Bailey is the bartender!    She us very pleasant and knowledgeable about her beer.   The happy hour is wonderful! .   Highly recommend the pickle fries and the hoisin chicken wraps. As of this posting , these and all beers were $5 between 2 and 5 pm.

Reviews.Author: Darren
Reviews.Content: Great burgers, Great prices, Great service. The burgers are so tasty. Sweet potato fries are waffled and crisp. Onion rings are a hit too. Must eat for anyone in your group or family

Reviews.Author: Kitty
Reviews.Content: Just had a delicious lunch which was made imminently better by the excellent attention of our lively (& lovely) server, Ben.  The kitchen was great about the food allergy of one of our group, & was happy to accommodate our related requests.

Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I would suggest a pass on this one-ordered burger med-it was well  fries were not even close to warm.  The service was fine and so was the Diet Pepsi-but that's about the best I can say for it

Reviews.Author: S.
Reviews.Content: Broadway Burger was one the high spots of the places we ate at in Vegas.  The famed buffets we tried were total busts so we decided to try the various eateries in New York-New York.  Of the three we tried, Broadway Burger was the best compared to other burger places.  The choices are many and unique, the flavor of the meat is super, the service is great, and so are the prices compared to others we experienced in Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Jacki
Reviews.Content: We went here twice during our last visit in April. service was good. burgers big and fries, there were plenty. they have a combo that is 14.95 for a burger fries and a drink, cant beat that. plus you get a big dill pickle!

Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your calories here. Their burgers are boring, the buns are tough and the food court ambience makes you feel like you are at a mall.  This is decent before Holsteins (@ Cosmo), but I would never come here again consider a much much better, tastier burger joint being a few hotels away.   The only good thing is their fries are freshly cut and fried.

Reviews.Author: Maestro
Reviews.Content: This was my 4th burger I tasted todat and probably the best.   Burger ordered medium rara and cooked perfectly, taste was good.  Lacked a good crust but had good flavor.  The fries were good also but they still had grease on them so that was a downer.  Service was fast and friendly.

Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I cannot comment on the food, only the service. There was none! We waited 10 mins for a booth to be cleaned. Mind you there were only 4 tables occupied, hardly busy. When we were seated we waited an additional 15 mins for a server to take our beverage order. She walked past us 3 different times taking another tables order and  just walking around. On the last pass by she said hang on guys i'll be there in a minute. Now, it's 100+ degrees in Vegas and after walking around all day and spending $ we were thirsty. My husband was so parched he even asked the barmaid for something to drink and got equally ignored. She took care of two other guests and just barked at him  i'll be there in a minute  He is a professional and is always polite, her attitude was not called for and the service was a complete failure! Finally after waiting over 20 minutes she asked what I wanted, I said just a water first, had planned on a root beer float. She huffed at me as if it inconvenienced her. I was a sever for 4 years and never once treated a guest like that! I don't understand the attitude, you work in food service, if you don't like it, find another job. Needless to say after the way we were disrespected and ignored for so long we got up and left without being able to eat. HORRIBLE SERVICE, plain and simple. No excuse, they weren't even busy!!

Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Not bad for burgers and fries, and of course a drink or two. Garlic fries were pretty ok. Service was great. Only came here because we had to use our dining credit and was short on time and not looking to eat too much. My left over burger was even good at 4 am! =)

Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: Loved this place--we had their bacon, cheddar burgers cooked  medium well  with a side of fries and a couple of beers.  Our server, LaDawna, was great.  The burgers were excellent as were the fries and service.  The price wasn't too bad either.  I don't think we waited more than 10 minutes for our food.  It was a nice break from having to navigate through the tremendous amount of high priced restaurants Las Vegas has to choose from.  Vegas ain't cheap anymore!

Reviews.Author: Luke
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like this place, but the food was not good.  I had the Cowboy Burger and ordered it medium.  It came out luke warm and I am perplexed by how they cooked it.  The center was well done, but the outside had was pink.  How does that happen?  The flavor was decent, but every bite had a different consistency.  The highlight of my meal was the onion rings.  Even they needed a little salt, but they were tasty!  On a positive note our server was a sweetheart, even though we dropped $40+ for two incredibly mediocre burgers.

Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Great burgers. Greats beers. Who could ask for more? Just had the black and blue burger and it was just as good as last year. So happy we found this place.

Reviews.Author: Gavin
Reviews.Content: Chicken burger patties were cheap and expensive for the quality. I do not recommend this place.

Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: At this place you can get a decent burger and really greasy fries.  I mean really greasy.  Like bring a roll of paper towels with you to wipe up the grease.  Girlfriend was resting and not hungry during our stay at NY NY, so I came down here for a quick bite.  Sat at the bar and ordered food there.  Bartender service was fine.  She was pleasant and quick and attentive.  And the food was good.  I got a standard BBQ burger - I forget what they call it, but it has bacon and BBQ sauce.  Burger was thick and juicy and cooked right.  It wasn't anything special, but it wasn't anything bad either.  Got an order of their regular fries - they also have garlic fries and, I think, sweet potato fries.  Fries were good, but like I said, you are also ordering a vat of the oil they are cooked in.  There's nothing really wrong with this place, but Gordon Ramsay's burger place is a half mile or so away at Planet Hollywood, and from what I understand, is amazing (granted, this is Vegas, and it takes 30 minutes just to get out of your hotel).  If you don't want to leave the hotel, then by all means, you can get a reasonable burger here.  But, there are better burgers nearby.

Reviews.Author: Joscelyne
Reviews.Content: After scoping out the variety of restaurants available inside NY NY, we settled on this place and it was a good choice for a quick and not too expensive meal.  I had a chicken and brie burger and it was yummy!  Lots of choices here, from the meat (beef, chicken, salmon, or veggie) to toppings and sauces to imported cheeses.  They had expensive but good beers on tap as well.

Reviews.Author: Howard
Reviews.Content: Burgers were really good though almost too large.  Fries were typical if not a little greasy.  However, what impressed me about this place was the service.  Our waitress repeatedly filled our drinks without our having to ask.  She even gave us a cup  to go  on our way out.  When my companion dropped a fork, a passing staff member had one in her hand in under 5 seconds.  She didn't even have a chance to ask.

Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: The absolute best sweet potato fries ever!  Burgers look delish but I didn't order that.

Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: This was a great stop for dinner! I will def come back for not only the burgers and fries but the great service Joe R. gave us.  He was so helpful with recommendations... I was pleasantly surprised with my overall experience.  Oh, btw the on tap IPA beers are great too.

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Awesome! Grabbed burgers here with my boyfriend and his brother and girlfriend the day before NYE. We all loved our burgers and fries. I'm celiac and got a gluten free bun and omission beer! ChaChing! Sweet potato waffle fries are awesome too. Would recommend to anyone and definitely eat here again!

Reviews.Author: Ckm
Reviews.Content: The burgers can be customized and are wonderful.  The salad greens are fresh and very tasty!  Try the Greek Burger or the Cowboy.  Excellent selection of craft beers.   Very nice sit down location!  Very friendly employees will help you with selecting sauces and all other ways to personalize your meal to your liking!

Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Pretty good burgers and fries here. If I would have known the amount of fries they served with each meal, I probably would have made the suggestion of just ordering one serving and sharing it amongst my cohorts.  The cute waitress did an excellent job with service. No complaints.

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Like most of the restaurants in NYNY, this was top notch. A bit pricey for burgers but well worth it.   You have the choice of the type of meat and they cook it perfectly. Grab a shake from Ben & Jerry to go with it. The fries and onion rings were so good! The staff was friendly and attentive.

Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Had a really tasty burger from here and some great crunchy fries. The wait for the burger was maybe a touch longer than expected - I think it was about 15 minutes. I usually think a burger is a quick thing. I think it was quite busy though in the main restaurant bit. I ate at the bar area.

Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: Great food! Nice size portions and Sandra my waitress was soooo helpful. They were closing in a few mins and the other waitresses didnt want to sit us but Sandra did!! Had the chili cheese fries, and a salad with a burger. Had to share everything of course, only because the portions are so big!

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Excellent burger! High end beef, wonderful flavor combo and the server (Dave) was the absolute best. I highly recommend the food and to maximize your experience, request Dave as your server - he totally rocks!!!

Reviews.Author: Elisa
Reviews.Content: Superb service & the food was outstanding. Maybe we hit on a good night. Wide selection of meats & toppings. Onion rings are the bomb!

Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: This review will be sweet and simple...  My baby girl and I stopped here for a late lite bite during a fun night out. We ordered two onion ring appetizers and they were delicious! This review is solely based on service and the onion rings, both were Fantastic!   Reasonable prices and the onion rings were yummy!

Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: We were in vegas and wanted to go to shake shack on a saturday night and holy hell was it crowded. Big long line out the door. Not wanting to put up with that we went to new york new york and found a burger place there. I'm so glad we did because there was no wait, and the food was exceptional and affordable. The burgers were delicious and the fries are natural cut and taste great and you get a whole basket of them with a combo. Or you can choose a plate of chili cheese fries with your combo for no extra charge. Who does that? So nice. I would definitely go there again.

Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: By far the best burger place I have ever been to. The salmon burger mushroom Swiss style is amazing!!!! Can't wait to come back next year!

Reviews.Author: Wesley
Reviews.Content: Came by on a whim and it was worth it. The Western Burger was great and the garlic fries packed a punch. The lemonade was excellent. I kind of want to come back tomorrow to try a different burger.

Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Food was just ok. Expensive for what little you get. 2 burgers, 2 sodas and 1 fry. $40.

Reviews.Author: Breonna
Reviews.Content: I like the environment and the food is good too . I decided on  their  Black & Blue Burger  with a side of Sweet Potato Fries cut Waffle Style.  This burger was delicious!  If you're not a fan of French Roquefort Cheese, I wouldn't recommend it because the cheese is  VERY  strong in taste in which I loved. The only reason I gave this place 4 stars is because our waitress. She wasn't horrible, but could have payed attention to the table a little more when we asked for condiments and finally received them 10 minutes later. Perhaps a busy day,  I don't know . Other than that I would still recommend this place because the food made up for the service we received.

Reviews.Author: Vera
Reviews.Content: Had to wait for a long time to be served. Bad food old dried chicken salad from Costco bag, mediocre burgers. I recommend avoiding this place

Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Great beer selection. Awesome service - Bailey was great. Manager Jeff was too. The burger was awesome. I mean you can't go wrong w a bacon cheeseburger w a fried egg on top.

Reviews.Author: Mo
Reviews.Content: I was at the New York New York lobby at the Strip and looking for a meaty place (burger, steaks, etc.). While walking around I saw this place, and went to sit in the bar. The regular burger (with no cheese) was surprisingly one of the best burgers I had in years and I am not exaggerating a bit. It was organic and I orderer it to cook as medium well. The burger came out so juicy, tender, flavory and delicious that it literally made my day. I am planning on going there again tonight to get the same burger. And the added bonus is that it was under $10! Bartender Dawn was funny and pleasant to talk to. We made a few jokes and had a good laugh. She also gave me some good tips on things to see in Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: We came here before going to see Zumanity. Two of us had a salmon salad, one salmon burger and a regular burger plus onion rings, garlic fries and sweet potato fries. Ashley, our server, was very attentive, made sure our water and drinks were refilled and was otherwise the kind of server one would want.  Food was good and priced fairly. I'd recommend it if you want good American.

Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Stopped by here to have lunch, because we were in NY, NY to pick up show tickets...  Seemed a little pricey for lunch.  Burgers were over $10 each and didn't include any sides.  I think I spent almost $30 for two people and that was only for 2 burgers, one order of onion rings, and tip (no drinks, since we had already gotten Starbucks).  I guess the cool thing here is that you have a choice of meat patties (beef, chicken, turkey, salmon, veggie) and can mix/match the type of burger that you want.  They also have a plethora of condiments that you can choose to have brought to the table.  The burgers themselves were just okay...  Could have used a little more seasoning on the pattie itself.  It was good, but nothing special.  The onion rings were great, but didn't get that many in a single order.

Reviews.Author: Ophelia
Reviews.Content: Came here for dinner after a loooong 7 hour drive from Lake Powell, UT to Vegas.  Definitely satisfied the need for some good post-road-trip grubbage.  What I liked: They offer chicken, turkey, beef, and veggie burgers.   Their fries are super yum! I ordered a chicken burger which was solid.  My dining companion got a beef burger and reported it  very good.   What I didn't like so much: The service was SLOOOOW (though friendly).  Maybe a bit above and  a-ok  experience but not quite   yay, I'm a fan.   If I could, I'd hit it with 3.5 stars.

Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: Nice ambiance and friendly service. Always points for old fashioned booths.  I ordered a plain burger, no cheese, no bun to accommodate my food sensitivities. The burger arrived with tomatoes and large pieces of butter lettuce which is optimal for making a lettuce wrap. There were no other basic garnishes like onions or pickles. They only do medium and well done.  Minus a point for not offering medium rare.  Ordered pickle on the side which was whole and quite perfect. And ordered onions which were nice and thin.  My eating companion loved his bacon burger with toasted onion and BBQ sauce.    We had pork belly sliders which were good, and probably did not even need all that BBQ sauce. Pork belly mmmm.....  Limited selection of meat for a burger place. Chicken, beef, salmon and veggie. Wish they offered lamb, or other meat options.  Extra points for using pastured beef. It was a decent burger and slathered with mayo and Dijon, quite tasty. Next time I will make a point of adding more fixings for more flavor. The burger alone did not stand out.

Reviews.Author: KYLE
Reviews.Content: This is for the Broadway Burger that is located in the New York New York hotel/casino, had dinner late on a Sunday afternoon.  We originally wanted to sit in the dining area, but realized we could also sit at the bar area, that is located on the other side of the hostess station/entry area.  There are two TV's located there so if it is a Sunday, you can watch the game also.  The burgers here are terrific, I had the Bacon & Cheese burger and my companion had the English Pub burger, one side of french fries and one side of onion rings.  The onion rings and fries were awesome, large portions as well.  The gourmet burgers were very large with a selection of side items you can request (Heinz 57, A1 steak sauce, Mayonnaise, etc.) and a good selection of draft beer and drinks.  Our server/bartender was very friendly and helpful as well.  I would highly recommend this restaurant, good service, great location, and terrific food, this is my second trip here and I will definitely go again.

Reviews.Author: Melody
Reviews.Content: Really good burger joint located inside the NYNY Hotel & Casino.   FOOD + Bacon and Cheese Burger ($12.95): My medium-rare beef patty was cooked to perfection. Juicy, well-seasoned, and loved that it was grass fed, free range, all natural and hormone free. You can really taste the difference. + Fresh Hand Cut Fries ($3.95): Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside. Nothing soggy about it. Delicious.  SERVICE Dave was our excellent waiter. On top of his game. Tip him well!  CONCLUSION Without a doubt, I will not hesitate to come back when in Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Liana
Reviews.Content: This place has bad reviews but I'm not really sure why?  Yes, you'll pay a dollar or 2 more for a burger here then you would in main street, Any Town, USA but you are at New York, NY hotel on the Vegas Strip.  Nothing is cheap here, not even the hot dog from the other stand.    I got a smoked chicken salad on arugula, goat cheese, walnuts and a yummy vinaigrette dressy.  Warning, the goat cheese came fried in a ball, but it was delicious!  The salad is large and a great portion of chicken,  BF got the a turkey burger with some toppings that seemed solid enough to me.  The server was really nice, we explained we had less than 30 minutes until our Cirque show started.  She explained all burgers are made to order and will take 20 minutes.  Our food came out in 20 minutes, she had our checks and everything ready.  Also, since the bar was limited to beer and wine, we were allowed to bring drinks from other bars inside which I know a lot of places frown upon.

Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: One of the best burgers I have had in a long time. Their garlic fries are great too. Our server was very quick abd attentative. I will definitely come back the next time I am in vegas. The greeter was also very cheerful when we walked up.

Reviews.Author: Ara
Reviews.Content: Amazing burgers. The meat is excellent whether you get beef, salmon or whatever.  I was really happy with the food. But the waiter wouldn't refill our drinks fast enough. I suppose it was too packed to expect otherwise.  Check this place out if you're at New York New York.

Reviews.Author: Henna
Reviews.Content: The Bella Burger is delicious! It's a portabello mushroom with panko. It's a vegetarian burger, but very  meaty  and delicious. I was reeeally hungry and felt like I could have eaten at least 1 1/2 of those burgers. I usually can't finish my meal, or I am completely stuffed if I do eat everything, but the size of the burger didn't leave me completely satisfied. I would definitely eat this again though! SO GOOD!!! :9

Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Had the most amazing burger ever. My southwestern burger had jalapeño bacon, guacamole, crumbled cheese and tortilla chips. My wife had a burger topped with cheese steak and was just as good. We also had their garlic fries which were equally good. If you are ever in LV, you need to head to NY NY and eat at Broadway Burger.

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: The Broadway Burger Bar & Grill is an outstanding addition to New York New York. I had the Southwestern Burger my first night at the hotel and I loved it so much I came back a couple of times. The burger was cooked to perfection, medium-well but incredibly juicy and flavorful. Topped with cotija cheese, jalapeno bacon and tortilla strips, it is now officially the burger of my dreams. The garlic fries are outstanding. They have a lot of unique burgers on the menu but you can also just get a plain-Jane cheeseburger if you want. Service was good on all my visits. I cannot wait to return to Las Vegas just so I can have another one of these burgers.

Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: Don't be tempted: the menu looks wonderful, but the taste doesn't match.  The Broadway Burger Bar & Grill couldn't have a better location, right in the heart of the New York, New York. And we wanted to try it from the moment we saw the sign. We were disappointed.  We ordered two  Cowboy  burgers and one child's chicken strips meal, all of which proved tasteless. That's a lot of calories and a lot of dollars for not a lot of enjoyment.  Some positives: we were seated immediately, and service was very fast even in the middle of lunch. And the onion rings (with some dipping sauce) were quite nice.  But you don't visit a burger restaurant for onion rings, so let's talk about the burgers. First, Broadway Burger Bar & Grill cooks burgers either  medium  or  well done , so if you like your burger  medium well  you're compromising before you even sit down.  Each burger can be made with beef ( all natural, grass fed, 100% free range Estancia Beef ), chicken, salmon, turkey, or veggie as its heart. And there are more than a few combinations of toppings on the menu. We picked The Cowboy ( Applewood-smoked bacon, barbecue sauce, crisp onions and pepper jack cheese. )  Every word of that sounds delicious. The real things were completely bland. Unseasoned ground beef has more taste at our house than all those wonderful combinations did here. Even with the pepper jack cheese and barbecue sauce, I couldn't find even a hint of spice or flavor in my meal.  With the most basic burger (the  B3&G ) costing $9.95, by the time we'd added drinks and onion rings, a meal for two adults and a small child rang up over $50. That's admittedly less than we might have spent at other casino restaurants, where everything is overpriced, but that doesn't make the product worth the price.  In-and-Out burger is just a ten minute walk down Tropicana, and would be a better experience for about a third the cost. Inside the casino, Nathan's (on the second floor) costs about the same but offers a much tastier meal.

Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Visited twice during my recent Vegas visit, once for lunch, once for dinner, both times ate at the bar and both times service was very good, a little better during the lunch visit.  For lunch had basic cheddar burger which was very good.  For the dinner visit had the black and blue (blacken seasoning with blue cheese, very tasty.  Both burgers were great.  However, both times i had the garlic and herb fries with my burgers.  This is where they lost a star.  They serve the fries in a metal basket that is shaped like a mini deep fryer basket lined with paper to catch the oil.  However the fries are packed into the basket so the oil is trapped and the fries are soft and mushy.  The first order was tolerable, but the second time was worse.  I'll know better next time.  There are three or four other types of fries and don't know if they result in same mushiness.  There are also many sauces that can be had on the side, though none really appealed to me.  Overall good experience, especially the burger.

Reviews.Author: Raven-Joie
Reviews.Content: My trip to the Broadway Burger only scraped it's way by because I was starving my butt off! Otherwise, this burger joint was a real disappointment to eat at :/  I ordered a burger that had BBQ sauce on it, which made it juicy..but unfortunately..the meat was way dry! Also, I got the loaded fries which were just so-so. They sprinkle the wrong cheese on it, and even though there are jalapeños, it wasn't at all spicy! Everything about the entire meal was completely average.   The service was really great, on the bright side!! Our waiter was funny and personable, and he didn't mind that I was little late for my reservation. (lol)   Overall, I would say pass on this restaurant; unless you're starving and everyone else has a long, long line!!!

Reviews.Author: Rhondi
Reviews.Content: Nice variety of various proteins besides beef, such as turkey burgers, grilled chicken, salmon and a portobello veg burger.  We had a party of 9 of varying tastes, I was told the beef burgers were good, my chicken was dry with little seasoning. The sides were good the fries and sweet potato fries.  We must have been on the outskirts of the restaurant, because we were either forgotten or not attended to with the service. The server that took our order did not deliver our food, thus she didn't know she mistook an order, we had to send a few dishes back because either the orders were taken wrong or the wrong order was picked up by the runners.  Nonetheless after the mixups or the corrected food orders arrived, the server was pretty clueless that the orders were not correct and we weren't happy.  So if you come here, do not sit outside, as you will be forgotten and not serviced.

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Je ressors a peine du restaurant et un avis s'impose ! Beaucoup de resto propose des burgers sur le strip, mais ce resto vaut vraiment le coup de s'y arrêter et déguster leurs burgers ! J'ai testé l'italian et il est vraiment très bon ! Le service est top et le cadre est en coordination avec le thème du resto. Je conseille bien évidemment :) A bientôt je l'espère lors d'un prochain séjour à Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Denis
Reviews.Content: This was a regular burger place.  Good fries (and plenty of them), and a fairly good patty melt, but nothing amazing.

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: We went yesterday before WWE. We just wanted to grab something and we were like this will be ok. But it was absolutely yummy. My son and my husband and I enjoyed everything. The burgers were awesome and the chili cheese fries were amazing. The service was great. We are so happy to find another local place to go to. The prices for being on the strip were great too. Really enjoyed it. It's really hard these days to get good food and good service. We will definitely be going back.

Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Good cowboy burger, chili fries (not too big of a portion) Caesar salad, s'western burger.  wait staff 'okay'

Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: We gave B3 &G a go once we saw their menu - great idea: they have about a dozen varieties of burger classics, and then you choose your burger: beef, chicken, turkey, veggie, and maybe a fish something.   I went with the Chicken BLTA and without even double-thinking, I assumed it'd be a marinated, grilled chicken breast. Unfortunately I assumed incorrectly. It was a ground chicken patty with some kind of seasoning all mixed in. I didn't love the seasoning.   The garlic and herb fries rock! You'll definitely want to bring some gum or a gallon of Listerine to combat the garlic breath. At least vampires will steer clear.   Our server, Tony, was cool enough. Leaving, I had only one closing thought: $5 for a pint of Bud Light? What the?!

Reviews.Author: Vinnie
Reviews.Content: Great place for burgers in NYNY. I'm always ready to try a different burger stand and this passed the test! A definite go back restaurant!

Reviews.Author: Marcy
Reviews.Content: Bread was tough . Not much flavor . Not worth the money fries where greasy and only barely warm

Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Love this place. In the back of the good court area. Great burgers and fries.....sit down experience also, which is a rarity in the Food Court area. Enjoy!

Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: My wife and I ate here recently, and we enjoyed it so much we ate here again two days later.  As others have mentioned, the restaurant sits inside the New York/New York Casino, near the Zumanity Theater, and it wasn't listed in the guide books, so it was a pleasant surprise to find. Their specialty is burgers, of multiple styles, and they are large, so it was all you could do to finish it when ordered with a side of fries. I had a British burger, with fries and a fried egg topping a generous beef burger, and my wife had the chicken burger, and the veggie burger on the second trip. The servers were very friendly and attentive, and the atmosphere feels like a outdoor cafe. The only negatives were that it sits below the roller coaster and can get noisy when the coaster is running, and if you order a milk shake, they run across the hall to get it from the ice cream place across the way. Not too bad in the Cons department. So...Staff - A Food - A Atmosphere - B+

Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: BOOOOO! That is the overall for this place. The food was no good, over done (I asked for medium), service was slow, and I could have eaten at a lot of other good places on the strip for the price.

Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: LOWERED EXPECTATIONS...... Went in here after wandering around the restaurants and thought it looked reasonably priced and tasty. My friend and I ordered food - hers came up in about 8 minutes, mine took exactly 22 minutes. Ridiculous. Then, after receiving my  patty melt  which I paid $7 for, I was saddened to find that it was less flavorful than the sourdough burger I could have gotten for half the price at Jack in the Box. SAD place, highly disorganized, LONG waits, and mediocre (at best) food. If you're drunk, you may rate this one higher. Otherwise, keep Yelping. You can do better.

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: : Amazing good food, and our server David is always a pleasure. We came here once on my stay-cation birthday weekend, we enjoyed the food drinks and service so much we had to come back again, and request to sit in David's section.

Reviews.Author: R
Reviews.Content: I went here twice this week.  Tuesday the grass-fed burger (medium) and onion rings were good.  However, the service was a bit slow.  I almost thought they forgot my order.  Wednesday the burger was better (I asked for well done this time) was great.  However, the onion rings were crispy on the outside but mushy on the inside.  They were almost inedible but I wasn't that hungry, so I didn't say anything. Also, my friend's fries were soggy.  The service was better, though.  A couple other reviews mentioned soggy fries, so their consistency needs to be improved.

Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: After a couple days of drinking a good ole fashion giant burger is just something I was craving and let me tell you Broadway Burger hit the spot. I had the Western Cowboy Burger with bacon BBQ and fried onions on top. one day and the Philly Cheese Steak Burger which is basically a Philly cheesesteak on a burger, works out great. Both were amazing and large and hit the spot.   Also for a side I would recommend the Jalapeño Garlic Fries, were spicy and tasty. The Garlic and Herb fries looked great as well.  As for beer cause well of course you are in Vegas they have a large craft beer section and many tasty beers to go with that.

Reviews.Author: Rumi
Reviews.Content: The moment we saw this place we wanted to eat here. We were seated right away but it took a few minutes for the server to come over. Even though she was quite nice she really hasn't tried a lot of items on the menu. Which she was honest about. I was trying to get an opinion on the burgers but she really couldn't sell me both. My bf didn't like the burger he got. He didn't complain but went ahead and just ate the fries and onion rings. They new he didn't like it and the manager did come over to ask if everything was fine. We still didn't say anything. I although enjoyed the cajun salmon. It could of used a little bit more veges on it but it was good with the popcorn shrimp. I would go back and give it another try

Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: This place is great. For me, its been the best food I've had all week on the strip.  If you can, ask for Joe R (the dude with glasses). He was cool and hooked us up with great recommendations, and came by to see us frequently even though it was busy.  I'm a Texan, and I approve of the cowboy burger.

Reviews.Author: Darla
Reviews.Content: Ok I have said this before, I am not much of a burger fan. My grandchildren wanted burgers so we came here. I must say over anything our waiter was exceptionally good. The booths were comfy and the food ended up being great. I had a turkey burger which was really good.  I took a bite of the partners burger and it was exceptional yummy for being beef. Oh yes and the garlic fries were just perfect. I would definitely recommend this place and come back here again ...

Reviews.Author: Yelena
Reviews.Content: The variety here is great and service is pretty good. The burgers are filling and I loved their chili cheese fries. I particularly liked that they have like 30 condiments to pick from, including wasabe spiced condiments and  all these awesome mustards. Service was attentive. The down was the noise from the renovation going around. Otherwise, not a bad place to grab lunch.

Reviews.Author: Katharine
Reviews.Content: Great choice of burgers.  I created my own with bacon, mushrooms and provolone.  It was delicious.  Fries were excellent as was the service.

Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: My god, where do I begin...  Going to not say too much as all around it was terrible so here's a few words to describe the restaurant's environment going in:  Wait time: 1 out of 5  Easy seating, long waits for food (45 mins) Terrible wait for a chicken BLT and a chicken caesar. I think I could've whipped it up myself in 20 or less if I had everything in front of me.  Food: (0 if possible) 1 out of 5  Chicken (the main protein in our dishes) were dry. I mean it was like eating an eraser. The salad leaves look like it's been sitting out. Not fresh at all.   Service: 3 out of 5  While there was nothing to serve, the waiter with an English/Australian accent was courteous and polite. She is the only reason I tipped 20%.  If you're looking for service, come to this restaurant. BUT avoid this place at all costs if you're looking to eat.

Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Overall 3.5 stars.  The staff is friendly and accommodating. Service is quick and efficient.  The burger was good but not mind blowing.  The fries were good.  I would definitely eat here again.

Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: We stopped by to have a late night bite to eat.  We ordered a basic burger which was quite tasty.  I loved that they had grass fed beef and organic offerings.  Coming from Seattle, we're kinda food snobs when it comes to those things.  Its a little pricey but worth it.

Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Good variety of burgers on the menu. Can also opt to build your own with burger, chicken, turkey and I think even veggie. Hubby enjoyed his bacon and cheese, a traditional bacon cheeseburger with English cheddar. I opted for the chicken bltg. The pepper bacon and the guacamole (which had a jalapeño kick) were complimentary to one another. The chicken was also cooked well, moist and juicy.  For $5 extra you can tack on a soda and fries. The portion of fries looked like it was enough to serve two. Can't speak to the flavor as didn't order the combo meal. They also offer shakes from the Ben and Jerry's across the way. The draft beer list was peppered with west coast microbrews like deschutes and full sail.

Reviews.Author: Zoe
Reviews.Content: I like that they use hormone free beef meat! Yeah! My husband tried the burger and I tried the caesar salad with beef patty. Both items are satisfactory and good. The price is not bad, and they offer 10% off to Nevada residents too. we found out this deal on the website. Would be nice if they would note this deal somewhere in the restaurant too. Anyway, the beef meat was good and size was good too. and the price is good with discount. We would consider coming back. No 4 stars yet because of lack of services. People aren't rude, just lacking attentiveness.

Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Sweet burger bar. Was in the area and decided to try this place out. It was a pretty good experience and meal. The service was pretty quick and the atmosphere was fun. The burger I ordered was pretty good. Lots of great flavor and wasn't too expensive which is good. I had a great time and I look forward to coming back in the future.

Reviews.Author: Geneva
Reviews.Content: Great great great make your own burger place. Need I say more. It's a great place to stop & have lunch while in Vegas. If you have a small appetite share a burger with someone & order an order of fries with salad to share.

Reviews.Author: Justine
Reviews.Content: My husband ordered the Cowboy Burger and I got the Asian Salmon Burger. My food tasted ok but my husband's bacon tasted really off. We were both immediately sick. To boot, our waitress was not friendly. Not a good experience. Definitely avoid this place unless you want to risk food poisoning.

Reviews.Author: Rachael
Reviews.Content: Some of the best food we had while in Vegas. We sat at the bar and ordered the onion rings for starters. They were perfect. My husbands burger was cooked to the perfect medium as ordered. The fries were delicious. I had the garlic jalapeno fries. Perfect amount of garlic with very thin slipped fresh jalapenos flaked on top. We had great service by the bartender. I wish we could have ate there atleast one more time before we left Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Absolutely awful!  First of all, the place itself looks nicer than the pictures online posted by the restaurant. While the service was super friendly from host to server, the food was not good at all. Also, the table could have been cleaner- for example, the ketchup bottle was a greasy mess which also had ketchup all over it.   The menu looked appetizing and offered a variety of options. Sadly, the sandwiches were bad. We chose portobello sandwiches thinking we would get a nice, fresh healthy sandwich. It was not! It was a fried portobello that looked like it was breaded by Sysco Co. There was no flavor in the breading whatsoever and it was the skinniest portobello I've ever seen! YUCK! The paremsan crisp on top was flavorless and the random dollops of mozzarella were mildly ok. The garlic fries were ok, but they were soggy. I was hoping for some crispy fries. They tasted edible, so we pretty much ate those and left most of our sandwiches.   This is not a good place to come, particularly for the portobellos. I would say keep on moving for a sandwich place.

Reviews.Author: H
Reviews.Content: Exactly what you want in a burger place.   Our waitress was very personable and attentive.  We didn't wait for drinks and food came out quick.  The fried pickles were delicious,  the dipping sauce was good.   3 burgers and a salad,  no complaints.  Burgers were cooked as ordered.

Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Flavor and quality, great! Accuracy of orders, not great. Every time we come here, EVERY time, they prepare one of our burgers completely different than ordered. While they are good to correct it, it does mean we are eating separately as we wait for the incorrectly prepared burger to be cooked properly.

Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: Friendly staff, good service, but boy... what a great burger, started selecting a good amber beer, then I was recomended by my server Lashawnda to have this southwestern burguer with tortilla chips and guac inside, soft fresh bun, smoked bacon and cheese... jalapeno mustard and habanero tabasco on the side... boy... im gonna remember this experience, I've been to buffets and fine dinnings in my 5 day vegas stay and this has been the best meal by far... manager approached the table to ask about our experience, he also seemed very confident in what they serve, that made me feel even better on my already great burguer.

Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: We stopped by here before the Zumanity show for a few drinks. We didn't eat, but the food next to us looked and smelled great. We sat at the bar, on the outside of the general eatery.Our bartender was very personable and she poured great drinks. Just a few steps away from the theater and you can take the bar drinks in with you.

Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: holy crap. order the veggie burger. do it. with sweet potato fries. their veggie burger used to suck, they changed it so it's like a giant breaded mushroom wtf literally it was so amazing. caps lock means i'm yelling this as i am typing. ITS SO GOOD.

Reviews.Author: Minh
Reviews.Content: I've had some great tasting burgers lately. So when I eat a burger nowadays, I expect that trend to continue and be impressed. Unfortunately not everyone makes an A+ burger. One can only dream of having the burger streak that I've been on right?  This location is convenient, it's the first thing you spot right after walking out of Zumanity. Located in the the Village Shops at NY-NY. Watching people indulge in their burgers makes it look good and tempting, especially when you're hungry. We weren't too hungry though, so Sarah A. and I split a:  Bacon & Cheese Turkey Burger - The patty was flavorful but overall the burger was too dry. I like my burger dripping wet and sloppy! Dry patty and overcooked bacon was too tough. It wasn't exactly the biggest burger either.  Drunk people overlook quality and gobble down everything. Too bad we weren't drunk enough.

Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: I just had the best burger in town. The English Pub burger was delicious. It comes with fried egg, grilled tomatoes and white cheddar cheese. The chilli cheese fries were awesome too.

Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Best burger I have ever had. The  cowboy  burger has an amazing blend of bacon and special sauce. Fries were perfectly seasoned and cooked. Service was excellent.

Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Decided to find a burger in Vegas before we said our final goodbyes to this town.  The ambience in here was everything you need from a good burger joint.  We ordered the chili fries which were delicious and fresh cut; simply delicious and savory.  The pub burger with a fried egg and French fries inside  this amazing and perfectly cooked burger was the perfect farewell meal.  Highly recommend this place.  Staff was courteous  and very accommodating. I will  definitely  visit again when I  return to  Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: Can't remember when I have ever had to ask  how much longer will it be ? For our food! This place was s-l-o-w--- waitress served sodas and also served us another before food came... My sweeties order was wrong..wrong burger... My order was for a medium cooked burger and it was cooked well done! I could not believe it! The table of 6 people next to us were not happy for the long wait for their food either and the waitress brought them their French fries first! I won't be back...ever!!!  A $12.00 burger???really??? The one star is for the waitress!

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: For those who don't want a burger made with beef you have the option of a chicken, salmon, turkey, or veggie patty. Had the bacon chesse burger and onion rings. For less than $20 a person in vegas had a great meal. Asked for ranch for the onion rings and the waiter not only brought it out but brought an aioli sauce that tasted awesome with the onion rings.  My husband got the black and bleu burger with sweet potato fries.  I'm personally not a big fan of sweet potato fries but they were the perfect combination of sweet and salty that I found myself sneaking them off his plate.  Both burgers were cooked perfect.  I will definitely go here the next time I'm in vegas.

Reviews.Author: SoCal
Reviews.Content: 30 May 2014, 07:00p  A friend brought me here for dinner after deciding we didn't want to drive anywhere to eat.  He'd been here before and said the food was good so I was game.  The restaurant was fairly empty for a Friday night and we were seated with no problem.  The menu allows for building of a custom burger or ordering one of their Gourmet Burgers or Salads.  We decided on two burgers and we'd share so we could try more than one.  We ordered:  Italian w/Chicken Southwestern w/Beef  I opted for the Broadway Combo which adds hand-cut fries and a drink for a $5 upcharge.  They allowed me to choose Virgil's Root Beer as my drink, but no free refills, which was fine with me.  Both burgers arrived at the same time and we proceeded to cut them in half ourselves. I thought the Italian was a little more interesting than the Southwestern and my friend agreed that the flavors were more complementary.  The Southwestern was good, but the Italian was better.  Even though there was a lot listed under the Southwestern, it almost seemed like not all of the ingredients were present.  The fries were also good.  They are steak fries so they weren't crispy.  Mine weren't overly salted and they were a little greasy, but they tasted good and the portions are generous.  I wouldn't hesitate to come back and try some other selections from the menu.  The staff was very friendly, the food was good, and the prices are reasonable.

Reviews.Author: A-z
Reviews.Content: Sometimes ya jus want a good hamburger...HOW YOU WANT IT. This is the place for that. HIGHLY RECOMMEND...if youre serious about your burger...and your bison...YOU HAVE A PLACE TO GO!!!

Reviews.Author: Claudia
Reviews.Content: well what could i say the burger was good but ive had better, i got the philly cheese steak, i pictured it was a shredded meat type of thing but it was actually a patty, and the meat was kinda dry at that, also u have to select the condiments that you want on a paper, we didnt even get what we asked for, the waitress talked alot! lol but had to ask repeated times to get water and extra sauces. good experience to try something new but i wont be going back.

Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: Yep a pleasant surprise in the NY, NY casino.  Walk around and find this place off the casino floor.  The burgers are good...the beer flows nicely and you might feel like you are eating on the streets of NY if it wasn't for the dark gloomy lights they use.  But def a good spot for good burgers.

Reviews.Author: Alaya
Reviews.Content: My burger us so delicious, get one if you have had a lot to drink and need something filling, I enjoyed my burger I have no complaints about it. I will definitely come back to New York New York for a burger again. Yummy My bacon cheese burger was delicious

Reviews.Author: Mareike
Reviews.Content: Was ist denn jetzt los? Wo man mir vor drei Jahren noch einen schmackhaften Burger mit allem Zipp und Zapp kredenzte, kam jetzt ein lieblos dahin geknallter Burger mit fadem Rindfleisch-Patty und Scheibe Käse ohne jegliche Soße daher. Nicht einmal Ketchup war darauf, das las sich in der Menükarte ganz anders. Gut, ich hatte keine Pommer dazu bestellt, denn aus Erfahrung und nach vier Wochen im Amiland weiß man, dass es eh zwecklos ist und es allenfalls schafft, zwei Pommer anzuknabbern, aber dass es so gar keine Deko und nicht einmal das obligatorische saure Gürkchen gab? Das fand ich für den Preis von 14 Dollar frech. Der Teller war so kahl, dass mich das Weiß fast blendete. Tja, da werden wir wohl nicht noch einmal hingehen... irgendwie komisch. Wo es Burgerläden wie Slot Machines im Casino gibt, sollte man mehr Wert auf gutes Essen legen. Der Service konnte es auch keiner nicht mehr herausreißen, dass der Koch irgendwie wohl keine Lust mehr hatte.

Reviews.Author: Teri
Reviews.Content: Oh My! The veggie burger is YUM! And the sweet potato fries? Crispy hot and flavorful. Now my mistake forgetting to X on the tomato, cause December not the time for them but from the service, presentation and flavor? Awesome on all counts! We will be back

Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: So my buddy's wife accidentally knocked over 2 beers. The girl working the bar, Dawn, would not replace them. It was a complete accident. It's understandable that she did not believe me, however Vegas bars give away free drinks all night long. To bit replace our beers after an honest mistake is absolutely ridiculous. Dawn should have incorporated her manager to find the root of the situation and provide good customer service by offering to romance the beers. She did not ask any questions. She just said I could purchase more beers as a solution. No thanks. On to Monte Carlo.

Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: We arranged for a group of 40 of us cyclists to have lunch here. As a former server let me say 40 people is a lot to handle, even if your business does it often. The staff were all very helpful and polite and the burgers were all very unique and tasty. I had the Philly cheesesteak burger with garlic and jalapeño fries. Wow! Very very good burger and I have pretty decent standards for those. The only thing that would keep me from giving 5 stars here is that they had no draft beer as the line for the kegs were blown. This is forgivable usually but the only thing they had for bottles were your typical domestic lagers which aren't my favorite. Still well done for serving 40 people.

Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: We were seated outside, directly across from the Ben & Jerrys. Crowds were looking at us. We had two waitresses, one was average one was quite rude. I had the Chicken & Brie with a Cesar Salad. It was okay, I kind of wish we went to Chin Chin's instead.   I sampled my brother's Cowboy Burger, and it wasn't that good. I don't know, The New York New York hotel is great.. but I've experienced better when it comes to this Broadway Burger Bar & Grill.   If you really want a burger, just go to the In N Out, because this place really misses the mark.

Reviews.Author: Khin
Reviews.Content: They have amazing huge burgers for around $10-12. The quality of the meat is outstanding. Wait staff was also super friendly and attentive.  The cowboy- topping of fried onions, pepperjack cheese and thick hickory bacon.  English pub- simple with a fried egg. Chili cheese fries- amazing hand cut potatoes, not too oiley with the gooey cheese and chili. Their chili is also made from great beef, none of that cheap stuff.

Reviews.Author: Sophia
Reviews.Content: We wanted just anything to eat after a long weekend and come here because it was close by. I wanted something a little healthier so I got a turkey burger. We ordered it at the bar and got it to-go and it took forever to get our burgers! I brought it back to our room and it was okay. It was cooked pretty well and had enough seasoning, but it definitely wasn't anything spectacular. It did hit the spot for a quick (kind of) cheap dinner. It doesn't come with fries though :/  Overall, it was okay.

Reviews.Author: Monique
Reviews.Content: Very dissapointing. Only thing that lightened up our day was our server Amy.  The place is not really cool to hang out, most people we met we're very much not interested in their work and in us. Amy was a pleasant surprise.  Both burgers were not special. And the ordered mayonaise wasn't served with the food but came out later. Most disappointing was my portabello burger with panko (?). It was so drained with fat that I couldn't lift my burger because the bun was soaked. Not oke.  If you have options: don't go here.

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: The service here is good, our server Jaimie was great and the yummy Tropical iced tea was never empty. I had the ahi steak salad which was cooked nicely but I recommend asking for the dressing on the side.

Reviews.Author: Kaitlin
Reviews.Content: We came here on our first night in Vegas for a bachelorette party after EVERYONE fell asleep and took lame naps while I got anxious and bored. ;) Needless to say I was ready to do things, but our bachelorette wanted food. We wandered and wandered...and wandered. And we ended up here because decisions weren't being made and people were getting hangry/cranky/anxious (including myself). It wasn't my first choice and I can't say I would come back.  I got the seared tuna salad, which was delicious, but the wasabi  dressing  drizzled all over everything was so strong that it basically murdered my taste buds. I love spicy and I love strong wasabi, but this was a shock and just a bit too intense. I wouldn't come back because it  just wasn't worth the money for such poor atmosphere and a lame experience.

Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Exceptional burger and fries. I had back-to-back trips between June and July and was glad to discover this little gem. Great selection of burgers. Very high-quality beef and ingredients. One of the more interesting things is the available condiments and sauces to choose from. Ask for Dawn the bartender to help you select.

Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: We decided to stay for a little while longer while in Vegas after the rest of our group left, and pick up some winnings, gamble the rest of our money, return a lost cell phone, and take advantage of the many dining possibilities that wouldn't be available once we got on the road.  After walking quite a bit hungover, and being probably the most sober I have ever been in Vegas, I was getting a TAD cranky, as was my cousin, who was having major clothing issues.  My poor boyfriend was dealing with us, but also really wanted to make it to NY NY because he had fond memories of it and its food court.  When we finally made it into the casino, I refused to eat at the food court because the lack of comfortable seating, and so, we compromised at a cheaper sit down restaurant, and ended up at Broadway Burger Bar and Grill.  They have a decent beer selection, that even though it isn't vast, it is a good selection of lesser known beers at decent prices ($6 pint) for Vegas (they have your boring standard beers if you really want to save the $.50, but then you wouldn't be my friend).  They have lots of different burger options, and you have your choice of beef, chicken, veggie, turkey or salmon.  My cousin and I ended up with the Southwestern and the BF got the Black and Blue with garlic fries to share.   In my state anything would have tasted good, but jalapeno bacon was just what the doctor ordered.  The Southwestern kicked major butt, with a great blending of flavors, and that delicious jalapeno bacon!  The Black and Blue was also good, but a little boring in comparison (it hurts my heart to call roquefort boring).  The burgers came on a great bun.  At first I thought it seemed a little large for the burger, but it really held its own against the sauces, and had a good taste on its own.  The fries were also really tasty, though I wouldn't have minding a tad more garlic, story of my life.  The service was very nice and attentive, and it was just what I needed to get my stamina up to make it back to our car (or maybe that was the hoppy beer).  The food was good, the prices were right, and how can you not love a restaurant that the fries come in a fryer basket?

Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I had the Smokehouse burger, A hamburger with brisket on it. Yes, it is as good as it sounds. Drenched in BBQ sauce with all of the classic fix'ins, it was delightful. Topped off with some fresh cut french fries I was stuffed and couldn't eat another bite. Head there if you're a fan of burgers!

Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: While looking for something to please all picky taste buds on my Birthday. We stumbled upon The Broadway Bar and Grill located inside the NYNY hotel casino on the  Streets of New York  promenade.  This area is filled with different restaurant outlets primarily serving quick service comfort food.   The burgers we tried were delicious.  I had the Italian topped with bruscheta style tomatos, aioli, and parmesan crisp.  My Burger was cooked slightly less than I prefer and came out more medium rare than medium. It was still tasty.   We also tried the Bella Burger which was a portobello mushroom stuffed with cheese and coated and fried in panko bread crumbs.  Very delicious!   All burgers are served a la carte. Sides are an additional  $4 to $5 but are a filling portion to share between two people.  We tried the pickle fries which were very good. Our order came out hot and coated with a light batter and we're still in a spear like shape.  They were missing a dipping sauce of some kind to enhance the flavor.  Even a ranch served on the side would be an improved taste.  Service was welcoming and attentive. I liked that they have a patio area which feels like your outside without being out side, it's a great place to people watch. Overall good creative and traditional burger recipes and prices were typical of Las Vegas Strip restaurant. Come hungry...leave happy.

Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: If you are a Burger Fan you have to stop in and try this place. Its a little pricy so squeeze out the cash. But in any case, you wont go away feeling like you didn't get your money's worth.

Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Ordered the veggie burger. It tasted OK. The patty fell apart without even picking it up! Service was sslowwwwww. It wasn't like it was busy @ the time we ate there, either! Plus, either waitress forgot to add my onion rings to the tag or the cooks neglected to make them. Not impressed! Next time, I'll go to Burger Bar for a good burger.

Reviews.Author: Zoem
Reviews.Content: Worst burger ever !!! No flavor at all tasted like a frozen patty very dry, were were told that the patty was lean.  Would have been nice to know ahead of time.  Garlic fries were good.  Don't waste ur money !!

Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: We went for lunch on Sunday when we arrived in Vegas and found this place.  The staff was very nice and fast.  We were seated right away and our server David was great.  He was very friendly and made suggestions for the menu since it was our first time eating here.  His suggestions were right on and we enjoyed the meal.  He was also very helpful with giving us tips for entertaining the kids.  The food was a bit pricey for the serving size but that's not a big deal.  Overall it was a good experience and I'd definitely go back.

Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: We went to the Burger Bar last night. looking for  happy hour menu.  Their happy hour menu was very small but very good.  Our waitress was very good and  very sweet. We enjoyed our dinner and our service.  Would return.

Reviews.Author: Bridget
Reviews.Content: A bunch of my friends and I had a college reunion in Vegas and on the last night there we decided to stop by this place for dinner. The burgers were really good, but the service was SLOWWW!! Not to mention, when one of the food runners (I'm assuming that's what he was) came out with a side of ranch for my friend, and she said thank you, he replied,  My pleasure...(pause)...Not really, they pay me to say that.  Um... really?  Minus the snarky dude, we enjoyed the food and had a good time.

Reviews.Author: Ma
Reviews.Content: This place is located in NY NY Casino Hotel in Las Vegas.  We came here to have lunch one afternoon. I ordered the Fresh Salmon burger on a wheat bun and my bf got a Cheese Burger and garlic fries.  Ok, salon burger was so fresh, i swear they must have a sea in the kitchen or something. I was really impressed with the freshness and taste. Pretty large size also. Loved it. Cheese Burger was good, step up from fast food but nothing gourmet.  Waitstaff was really pleasant. The manager actually brought our food out and came to check up on us once more. The atmosphere blends well with the hotel.  I wouldnt go out of my way to eat here,its not a Vegas specialty place, but if its convenient, then yes.

Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: This time when in Vegas, I sat at the bar and Ben was my waiter/bartender.  Ben was great, we had some good conversations. I tried the Salmon Burger and it was killer.  And the fries were excellent. Price was good, service was great, nice people everywhere.  What more could you ask for? Will visit again when in town.

Reviews.Author: Jenette
Reviews.Content: Good burgers... Onion rings were quite tasty too.  The service and food was pretty fast too.  Located inside New York New York hotel.

Reviews.Author: Stanley
Reviews.Content: BROADWAY BURGER BAR & GRILL Exploring the food court at New York New York, we stumbled upon this burger joint. We were hungry, so we decided to give it a try. We ordered the salmon burger and some garlic fries. The burger was so-so, and the garlic fries were greasy and didn't have enough of a garlicky taste. It helped stem the hunger, but did nothing to compare itself against the burgers at The Counter.

Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: Some of the best burgers I have had.  Juicy, tenderness in every bite.  My daughter and I shared the Philly Cheesesteak burger. It was huge.   We also had a basket of garlic fries, they were delicious.  Service was fast and friendly.

Reviews.Author: Manuel
Reviews.Content: The panko crusted Portobello mushroom burger was ok it had a pretty good crunch. The food was good for a late night eat.

Reviews.Author: Kenn
Reviews.Content: We were unable to find a great restaurant at NYNY, so decided to play safe. You can't go wrong with burgers, right?  Ordered: B3G burger with crispy onions + Chicken BLTA with onion rings.  Decent, but nothing spectacular.

Reviews.Author: Kandice
Reviews.Content: WONDERFUL! Fantastic burgers, you get a lot for what you pay for. The Caesar Salad was really great too, enough to share with another person (which my husband and I shared). Wish I had room for the shake and cookies, but we were too full for dessert!

Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: There is still a place in Vegas, at a casino that doesn't kill you on price. Decent food and you don;t have to go on run at the Craps table to afford it.

Reviews.Author: Sheri
Reviews.Content: We were her for lunch on 2/12/14. The burgers were really good and we had great service from Paul and Baily. Also met a couple from Canada while we were sitting there and just so happens the Canada-US Olympic hockey game was on the teli which made for our conversation. My family are locals and I am here every 6-8 months definitely will be back for the burgers again.

Reviews.Author: Wolf
Reviews.Content: Now, that's a tasty, tasty burger. I got the Cowboy--Applewood Bacon and jalepeno jack cheese. Also got me some onion rings. All around, a very decent burger meal, considering the grill is buried deep inside the New York New York Casino. The burger meat tasted like premium, well-aged beef. The bacon was thick and crispy. The onion rings where piping hot, thick and crunchy.   What's even better than the burgers at the Burger Bar is the top-notch selection of beers on tap. They had Rogue Dead Guy Ale, Full Sail Amber Ale (representing Oregon--aw-ight!) Stone Arrogant Bastard, Arbita Turbodog, Sam Adams, Firestone Union Jack IPA, New Belgium Mothership, and a couple of others. That's a damn good line-up craft beer line-up. Somebody knows how to pick good brewski at the Burger Bar, that's for sure. Oh, yeah, if you like mass-production crap beer like Bud, Bud Light and Blue Moon, they have that, too.  Friendly, attentive service rounded out my supper satisfaction. I'd go back if I had another day to spend here in LV.

Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: After first arriving in Las Vegas, this is the first place my friends and I ate for lunch at and we were certainly not disappointed. As far as burgers go, I would say, this is as good as your going to get. The portion size per burger is huge, the amount of choices you can get on it are endless, and the taste and quality is perfect. Went here twice (once at the beginning of my trip and once at the end) and both times we enjoyed the place very much. I've had many standard hamburgers, but Broadway Burger in NYNY is far beyond that. I almost wish I stayed longer to try all the burger options.   PROS *Price - For the price it was certainly worth it. With tip, I think I paid around $16 for a really good burger. That may sound expensive, but for Las Vegas I think that is pretty reasonable after everything is said and done.  *Quality & Taste - A lot of fancy restaurants overcharge for a standard hamburger, but this place really brings flavor and juice to its burgers. Not to even mention there are a ton of options to put on your burger and make it how you really want. I got the Cowboy burger and added a fried egg, to give it a ton of extra flavor.  *Portion Size - Burger is huge. You will be full after eating it.  *Atmosphere - It's in NYNY, so when you're eating there, you feel like your actually in a city. It's pretty cool have they have a whole section for restaurants in the area, so when you walk around you'll see a NY Pizza place and so on.
